turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are your delivery times like from my address?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It should be there in 30 to 40 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I order added sides like smoked gouda cheese or smoked chicken?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes we have those and many more on our extra sides menu.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do you serve gluten free pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes we serve gluten free pizza dough and pasta. The gluten-free pasta options are made with flavorful corn spaghetti.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: We have 3 pizzas can we get extra packages of pepper flakes and parmesan cheese?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeas we will add extras to each pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a deep dish pizza from the kitchen for special order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No we do not serve deep dish style pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Your campfire pizza looks good what is on that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A cheese pizza with all natural flour for our dough (absolutely no ... Campfire. smoked sausage, sweet onion marmalade, gorgonzola & fresh rosemary

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can we order anchovies with one of the pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes Anchovies are a part of out specitaly menu add ons.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That will vary with your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes it will rock your world.

items.name: extra packages of pepper flakes and parmesan cheese
